Key Match Events: Lauri Markkanen exited the game due to a lower back spasm, forcing him to miss the entire second half
Post-Match Reflections: Jazz coach Will Hardy will wait until Thursday to determine if Markkanen is good to play
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Utah Jazz lost to the Sacramento Kings 113-96
Others: Lauri Markkanen has averaged 18.0 points, 7.3 boards, and 1.8 assists in four games this season
